nodes.text: Sleeping Rose was an establishment located in a seedy part of the Coruscant Underworld. It was situated right between Ihouse and Enmonst Rclub. A large, lumnious, white Aurebesh sign with red letters spelled out the name of the establishment. During the Clone Wars, bounty hunter Cad Bane was planning a mission to break into the Jedi Temple and steal a Jedi holocron, and briefly stayed in an apartment located in the same block as Sleeping Rose.
During pre-production, Sleeping Rose was called "Hotel 77".
